helio.materialiser.data.handlers

Class RegexHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • helio.materialiser.data.handlers.RegexHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataHandler, java.io.Serializable

    public class RegexHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataHandler
    This object implements the DataHandler interface allowing to handle unstructured documents. It allows to reference data allocated in an unstructured document using a valid Regular Expression expression. This object can be configured with a JsonObject that must contain the key 'iterator' which value is an Regular Expression used to split the document into sub-documents.
    Author:
    Andrea Cimmino
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
